task: Calculate the total forest cover area within the area of interest (aoi) using the `perPixelareaForestCover2000` image. Define a new variable named `areaForestCover00` to store the result. Use the `ee.Reducer.sum()` reducer to sum up the values of the image within the specified geometry. Set the scale to 30 meters and the maximum number of pixels to 1,000,000,000.

import geemap
import ee
# Load the Hansen forest change dataset.
fc = ee.Image('UMD/hansen/global_forest_change_2018_v1_6')
# Define the area of interest (AOI).
aoi = ee.Geometry.Polygon([[[95.65089582845576, 17.491599376654623], [95.65089582845576, 16.743504525987667], [
                          96.68635725423701, 16.743504525987667], [96.68635725423701, 17.491599376654623]]])
# Select the "treecover2000" band.
treeCover00 = fc.select('treecover2000')
# Identify the pixels that had more than 20% forest cover in 2000.
fcGt20P = treeCover00.gt(20)
# Create an image where the value of each pixel will represent the area of the pixel.
perPixelareaForestCover2000 = fcGt20P.multiply(ee.Image.pixelArea())

task: Print the value of the variable `areaForestCover00`.  Make sure to define `areaForestCover00` before running this code.
context:
import geemap
import ee
# Load the Hansen forest change dataset.
fc = ee.Image('UMD/hansen/global_forest_change_2018_v1_6')
# Define the area of interest (AOI).
aoi = ee.Geometry.Polygon([[[95.65089582845576, 17.491599376654623], [95.65089582845576, 16.743504525987667], [
                          96.68635725423701, 16.743504525987667], [96.68635725423701, 17.491599376654623]]])
# Select the "treecover2000" band.
treeCover00 = fc.select('treecover2000')
# Identify the pixels that had more than 20% forest cover in 2000.
fcGt20P = treeCover00.gt(20)
# Create an image where the value of each pixel will represent the area of the pixel.
perPixelareaForestCover2000 = fcGt20P.multiply(ee.Image.pixelArea())
# Sum up the values of all the pixels within the geometry.
areaForestCover00 = perPixelareaForestCover2000.reduceRegion(
    reducer=ee.Reducer.sum(), geometry=aoi, scale=30, maxPixels=1000000000.0)
